response: narrative=Andrew Stanley was last seen at a beach near Home after playing with his brother. Friends and family, including Mathew Little, were worried and contacted authorities.

narrative=Andrew Stanley was last seen at a movie theater concert venue with his brother. After a quick trip to the bathroom, Andrew wandered off. Family members, including his grandfather Victor Watts, joined the search efforts, eventually locating him safe at the beach.

narrative=Andrew Stanley, a 10-year-old boy, went missing from his home at 312 Greengairs Road after a heated argument with his brother led him to storm out in distress. Andrew, noted for his growing paranoia about being under surveillance, often felt he was being watched. His family noticed patterns of anxiety in the days leading up to the incident. Following the argument, Andrew was last seen by a neighbor heading towards the local ferry terminal, a spot he occasionally visited. Despite searches at the concert venue and nearby areas, no sign of him emerged. Days later, police traced Andrew to a bathroom at 9 Caroline Street. Thankfully, he was found safe and unharmed, though shaken by the ordeal.
narrative=Andrew Stanley was last seen boarding a ferry after leaving the beach with his brother. It was suspected his obsession with an online game led him to a movie theater alone, causing concern.
